exceptions.exn: The reference Hprime was not found in the current environment.

In environment p : nat z : Z_Zp Hp : p = 0 -> False x, y : Z_Zp H0 : x ⊗ y = Zp X, X1 : Prop H1 : p = 1 -> False H2 : forall q : nat, divides q p -> q = 1 \\/ q = p H_p_neq_1 : Zp = Op -> p = 1 X0, X3 : Prop The term "H_p_neq_1" has type "Zp = Op -> p = 1" while it is expected to have type "prime p".
The reference Hmul was not found in the current environment.

In environment p : nat H3 : Z_Zp Hp : p = 0 -> False z, x, y : Z_Zp H0 : x ⊗ y = Zp X, X1 : Prop H1 : p = 1 -> False H2 : forall q : nat, divides q p -> q = 1 \\/ q = p H_p_neq_1 : Zp = Op -> p = 1 X0, X3, X2, X5 : Prop H : forall x, prime p -> (x = Zp -> False) -> Zp_invertible x H4 : forall x, prime p -> Zp_invertible x -> x = Zp -> False H5 : prime p -> forall x, x <> Zp -> Z_Zp H6 : prime p -> forall x, x <> Zp -> nat Unable to unify "nat" with "?Goal0 \\/ ?Goal".

exceptions.tactic: apply Zp_invertible_invert with (x := x) in H_inv_x.

original: intros p Hp y x Hprime Hmul. unfold prime, divides in Hprime. destruct Hprime as [H_p_neq_1 _]. unfold Zp in Hmul. destruct (Zp_invertible_prime x H_p_neq_1) as [H_inv_x]. rewrite <- Hmul. apply or_comm. apply Zp_prime_invert. auto. apply Zp_invertible_invert with (x := x) in H_inv_x. auto.
